refnamediv.refpurpose: Documentation for RTS2 telescope pointing model.

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: Pointing model function is to, give target position, calculate corrected position the TCS shall be pointed to in order to point on target. Pointing model is in fact a function, which accepts two parameters (hour angle and declination for GEMs) and returns corrected target coordinates.
